content: On the Topos Institute blog, Brendan Fong argues that, unfortunately, YouTube thinks category theory is for men.

This is not isolated to category theory. In a study of French science YouTubers:

Communicators report that their audience does not contain many women according to their channelâ€™s YouTube statistics (M = 19.26%, SD = 17.36, n = 149).

So the case of the Topos channel is not even that extreme.
